title: Organizational Development Practical Skill Strengthening: Instructional Design Expert Program for Online Teaching Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of educational theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: By applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation), learners can design one or more microlearning modules.
Educational content prototypes can be developed using CAI tools such as Articulate Storyline
Assessment items for measuring learning effectiveness can be structured into three types: written, practical, and peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
